Description:
Enhance your Zerodha Desktop experience with our Paper Trade helper, exclusively designed for Zerodha users. Introducing a seamless and secure way to practice trading without the risk â€“ all within your browser.

Key Features:

Paper Trade Anytime, Anywhere: Experience the thrill of trading without actual financial commitment. Practice your strategies and hone your skills effortlessly.

Zero Logins, Zero External APIs: Your security is our priority. No need for external logins or API calls. All information is securely stored within your browser, ensuring a 100% safe trading environment.

Simple Installation: Just install the extension, and you're ready to start paper trading on Zerodha. No complex setups or configurations required.

Seamless Integration: When you click on 'buy,' seamlessly switch to paper trading mode. All your paper trades are conveniently accessible in the dashboard for easy tracking.

Live Price Updates: To provide you with the most realistic experience, the extension fetches live prices for added stocks. Ensure the stocks are visible on the page to get accurate live price updates.

How to Use:

Install the Zerodha - Paper Trade Chrome Extension.
Navigate to Zerodha Desktop and log in.
Click on 'buy,' and you'll find an option to initiate paper trades.
Monitor and manage all your paper trades efficiently from the extension dashboard.
Note: The visibility of the added stock on the page is crucial for fetching live price updates.

For Feature Requests:
We value your feedback! For any feature requests or inquiries, feel free to reach out to us at thyagarajan.c7@gmail.com.
